评论详情: Ordered this sweater for fall, So comfortable and looks really cute on. I recommend sizing down if you don’t want it to be oversized. It’s super light and warm.

I really like this sweatshirt. It has an extra layer of insulation inside, making it warm and comfortable even in cold weather. The color pairs perfectly with many steel-colored outfits, adding a stylish touch to the look. The material is very soft and pleasant to the touch, making it a joy to wear. I definitely recommend it!
Fit is true to size for an oversized fit. Quality is great, fabric is very soft, not itchy at all. Love the fit and the slits on the side, perfect for the cooler weather to come!
